name: PingPongScoreKeeper
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: ping pong score keeper
des: The game is to 20 but win by 2 if tied. Each person serves 5 and alexa will automatically let you know who is serving next. When at game point the person who is losing will always serve. For alexa "the players are "" and "", "" scored
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
